definition: abbr. for 青海[Qing1 hai3], Qinghai Province
Zhuang ethnic group of Guangxi, the PRC's second most numerous ethnic group

sentences.english: However the distribution of old and young makes this picture more complex.
sentences.chinese: 然而老年人和青壯年的分佈情況卻帶來了更多的問題。

sentences.english: According to the American Cancer Society, melanoma is one of the most common cancers in young adults today.
sentences.chinese: 美國腫瘤研究學會報告顯示黑色素瘤多發於青壯年。

sentences.english: Physical activity is for people in the "prime of life".
sentences.chinese: 身體活動是“風華正茂”的青壯年人的事。

sentences.english: In her heyday, my mother was a fitness fanatic.
sentences.chinese: 青壯年時期，母親是位健身迷。

definition: to make more youthful/to promote younger staff
to turn peril into safety (idiom); to avert a danger (esp. political or medical)
to accompany/(of a doctor etc) to do a follow-up (on a patient, client etc)
disadvantaged social groups (e.g. the handicapped)/the economically and politically marginalized/the dispossessed
unable to move freely/difficult to get about
to apply for (a subsidy, unemployment benefit etc)
